rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual cooking advice using neutral language.
Segment describes a potential future outcome ('will also kill').
The segment provides safety advice ('will also kill any viruses') but does not use the keyword 'safe' for consumption, falling under Q7.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes safeguard/action: 'Properly cooking poultry and eggs... will also kill any viruses'.
